hero.title: Tday
hero.subtitle: A swiss army knife of a personal planner — with a Notion-style editor, calendar view, customizable pages to organize your todos, and a bunch of nifty extras!

features.title: Natural language processing
features.description: Simply type your tasks naturally. Our intelligent NLP engine automatically extracts dates, times, and durations from your input.

features.title: Beautiful calendar view
features.description: See all your tasks at a glance. The integrated calendar provides a clear overview of your schedule with intuitive visual indicators.

features.title: Notion-style editor
features.description: Capture your thoughts with a powerful, distraction-free editor. Format text, embed media, and organize your ideas effortlessly.

features.title: End-to-end encrypted storage
features.description: Your files are protected with military-grade encryption. Store documents, images, and attachments with complete peace of mind.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Tday (“we”, “our”, or “us”) is a personal productivity app available at https://tday.ohmz.cloud/. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect and how we use it.

1.title: Information We Collect
content: Account data: email address and time zone
User content: todos, notes, and encrypted files
Technical data: IP address, browser and session info
Cookies and local storage for authentication

3.title: Data Storage & Security
3.content: Tday uses NextAuth for authentication, NeonDB for storage, and Vercel for hosting. Files are encrypted where applicable. While no system is perfectly secure, reasonable steps are taken to protect your data.

4.title: Sharing of Data
4.content: We only share data with service providers required to operate Tday. We do not sell your personal data.

5.title: Cookies
5.content: Cookies and local storage are used for login sessions, preferences, and security. Disabling cookies may affect functionality.

6.title: Data Retention
6.content: We keep your data while your account is active. You may delete your account at any time and your content will be removed within a reasonable period.

7.title: Your Rights
7.content: You may access, correct, delete, or export your data using the app features.

8.title: Changes
8.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Updates will appear on this page.
